values: 上升；升高；增长；上涨；提升；起立；站起；崛起；隆起；凸起；竖起；高耸；耸立；涌现；出现；数量增加；提高；改善；获得晋升；起义；膨胀；发酵（面团）；升起（太阳或其他天体）；复活；起源
上升；（数量或水平的）增加；加薪；起伏；隆起；起床；起立；崛起；起义；加剧；涌现；高地；坡度；斜坡

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 升高；站起来；反抗（rise的过去分词）
上升（rise的过去式）；增加；起立
起床者；起义者；竖板；叛徒

word_mean_info__list.difference: 书面用词，多用于诗歌或比喻中，具有特殊的修辞色彩。
及物动词，常用词，多指把某物从低处升到高处，有时作引申用。
普通用词，指具体的或抽象的事物由低向高移动。
语气比raise强，指用体力或机械的力举起或抬起某物。

word_group.brief_definition: 兴衰；起伏；（价格等的）涨落
在增加；在增长；在上升；在上涨；变得更成功
(通常用来催促起床)快起床, 醒醒吧
在特殊场合超常发挥；在特殊场合应付裕如

word_group.phrase: rise like a phoenix from the ashes
rise like a rocket and fall like a stick

word_group.brief_definition: 惹某人生气；惹某人动怒

bilingual.source: The sea level will rise as well.
The water will rise up to the Leaf through the Stem.
bilingual.target: 水将通过茎上升到叶子。
太阳每天早上都会上升。

bilingual.source: The rise in sea levels is alarming.
bilingual.target: 海平面上升是令人担忧的。

bilingual.source: The balloon began to rise into the sky.
bilingual.target: 气球开始上升到天空中。

bilingual.source: The sun will rise at 6 AM tomorrow.
bilingual.target: 太阳将在明天早上6点上升。
他的成绩在这个学期逐渐上升。

bilingual.source: Prices continue to rise due to inflation.
bilingual.target: 由于通货膨胀，价格继续上升。

bilingual.source: The river levels rise during the rainy season.
bilingual.target: 在雨季，河流水位会上升。
随着时间的推移，房价逐渐上升。

list.abstract: 《rise》是一首流行英语歌曲，由美国流行女歌手凯蒂·佩里（Katy Perry）演唱，Katy Perry、Max Martin、Ali Payami等作词，于2016年7月15日发行，收录于专辑《2016年第31届里约奥运会歌曲全收录》中。该歌曲是2016年里约奥运会宣传曲。 《rise》歌曲激励人心，鼓舞士气，前半段突出的是奥运冠军荣耀，后半段则集中展现体育人的泪水与艰辛。凯蒂·佩里借这首歌曲表达了“让世界人民团结友爱”的愿望。这首歌曲一经发行就登上iTunes25个国家地区歌曲榜首，并且在全世界各大主要城市都有大型宣传、空中文字和建筑投射。 《rise》MV由瑞典音乐人马克斯·马丁制作。整个MV内容有失落，有遗憾，也有惊喜与胜利。让人在感受冠军力量的同时，也能触及到灵魂。体育不只是奥运金牌的光辉，除了欢笑还有泪水，体育精神是共通的。
rise，英语单词，名词、动词，作名词时意为“（数量或水平的）增加；加薪；（权利等）增强；上升；小丘；（诱饵）游上水面；源头；（楼梯的）级高；晋升；出现”。作动词时意为“攀升；起床；升起；休会；（数量）增加；变得更成功；（声响）提高；（风）刮起来；（情感）增强；（毛发）竖起；（土地）凸起；起源；发酵”。

yingyinNormal.en: One day, Simba, the sun will set on my time here and will rise with you as the new king.
yingyinNormal.zh: 总有一天，太阳将会跟我一样慢慢下沉，并且在你当国王的时候一同上升。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you suggesting the work of a neurobiologist like Babinski could ever rise to the significance of a physicist like Clark Maxwell or Dirac?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你这是暗指神经生物学家的成就例如巴宾斯基能上升到物理学家例如克拉克·麦克斯韦或狄拉克的层面？

yingyinNormal.en: The default rates are already up from 1% to 4%, fellas. And if they rise to 8%, and they will, a lot of these BBB's are going to zero, too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 违约率已经从一个百分点上升到了四个，如果升到八个，肯定会升到八个，这些评级BBB的债券就会一文不值。

yingyinNormal.en: Be enslaved or rise up to rule.
yingyinNormal.zh: 被奴役，还是站起来统治世界。

yingyinNormal.en: You are welcome, Khutulun. Rise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 欢迎你，忽秃伦，起来吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Rise up against the bloody Red Queen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 起来反对血腥的红皇后。

yingyinNormal.en: The rains will return and the river will rise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 雨季会再来，河面将升高。

yingyinNormal.en: Silence in the court. Silence in the court. All rise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 肃静，肃静。全体起立。

yingyinNormal.en: When I rise to power, those people will be sterilized.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等有一天我掌权了，我肯定会灭掉这帮人。

yingyinNormal.en: Cowards, all of you! None of you rise to meet my challenge?
yingyinNormal.zh: 懦夫，你们全都是懦夫。你们谁都不敢和我挑战？

yingyinNormal.en: I couldn't let you rise to your father's last taunt. What taunt?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不能让你再遭受你爸爸泼冷水。泼冷水?

yingyinNormal.en: Jenny Humphrey's rise to the penthouse has been short and sweet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 珍妮·汉弗瑞飞上云霄的过程，短暂而又甜蜜。

yingyinNormal.en: With the emergence of the stone age came the rise of a new species.
yingyinNormal.zh: 石器时代的来临，诞生了许多新物种。

yingyinNormal.en: Good night kittens, close your eyes. Sleep in peace until you rise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 宝贝们晚安 闭上眼睡觉觉 一觉睡到大天亮

yingyinNormal.en: And in a hopeful sign for middle-class families wages are on the rise again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 工资再一次上涨，这是给予中产家庭以希望的信号。

yingyinNormal.en: And thankfully, their embarrassment was overshadowed by the rise of Fascism.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过幸好，当时西班牙内战拯救了让两国的尴尬。

yingyinNormal.en: I say unto you, welcome! Welcome and rise! Welcome, King under the mountain!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要说，欢迎，请平身，欢迎山下之王。

yingyinNormal.en: The game that we love is dying. The Clones, they are killing it! We must rise up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们热爱的足球正在衰亡，那些克隆球星正在毁掉它。我们必须挺身而出。

yingyinNormal.en: Fine! Rise up, all of you! You want to put yourselves between me and the man-cub?
yingyinNormal.zh: 停，你们竟敢无视我，非要卷进我和人孩之间的战斗吗？

yingyinNormal.en: It doesn't matter how far you might rise. At some point, you are bound to stumble.
yingyinNormal.zh: 无论你有多么成功，难免会遇到失意之时。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 增加; 增强; 提高
隆起; 斜坡; 小山

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 反抗；起义；造反；叛乱

word_family.mean: v. 升起；上升；起身；站起；隆起；高起；增加；增长；上涨；提高；改善；接近

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 在增加；在增长；在上升；在上涨；变得更成功

sense_info_list.en: increase in number, size, amount, or quality
sense_info_list.zh: 增加; 增强; 提高

examination_example.sentence: The demand that <highlight>rose</highlight> in those societies for entry to higher education extended to groups and social classes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这些社会中，接受高等教育的需求增加，扩大到了各个群体和社会阶层。

examination_example.sentence: The general pay <highlight>rise</highlight> with a better economy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着经济好转，工资普遍上涨。

examination_example.sentence: Starting around 2012, requests for the visas <highlight>rose</highlight> sharply; from 2011 to 2016 the number of visas issued more than doubled.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从2012年左右开始，申请签证的人数急剧增加；从2011年到2016年，签发的签证数量翻了一番多。

examination_example.sentence: Obesity has <highlight>risen</highlight> among adults and children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 成人和儿童的肥胖率有所上升。

examination_example.sentence: The interest in science fiction is on the <highlight>rise</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们对科幻小说的兴趣在提高。

examination_example.sentence: Monarchs can <highlight>rise</highlight> above "mere" politics and "embody" a spirit of national unity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 君主可以超越“单纯的”政治，“体现”一种民族团结的精神。

examination_example.sentence: We still have the imaginative capacity to <highlight>rise</highlight> above temptation and reverse the high-speed trend.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们仍有富于想象的能力去摆脱诱惑，并扭转这种高速发展的趋势。

examination_example.sentence: Construction took 17 years as the building slowly <highlight>rose</highlight> wing by wing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 建造工作耗时17年，该建筑逐翼展开。

sense_info_list.en: be or become visible above the surroundings
sense_info_list.zh: 隆起; 斜坡; 小山

examination_example.sentence: Mauna Kea's peak <highlight>rises</highlight> above the bulk of our planet's dense atmosphere.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 莫纳克亚山的顶峰高出我们星球大部分稠密的大气层。

examination_example.sentence: This three quite different ways in turn have given <highlight>rise</highlight> to different sets of problems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这三种不同的方式反过来又引起了不同的问题。

sense_info_list.en: get up from lying, kneeling, or sitting
(of a group of people) to begin to oppose or fight a bad government or ruler
swell because of the action of yeast or baking powder

word_usage.usage:
动词raise后必须接宾语，而rise不接宾语。raise表示举起、提起、提升、增加；表示人或物从低处向高处上升以及数字上升或数量增加多用rise。
例：He raised his head from the pillow. 他从枕头上抬起头来。
       Costs are always rising. 费用总是不断地增加。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 抬高(价格); 增加(数量)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 起床的人；楼梯踏步竖板；立管；低平台；降落伞吊带；滑翔伞吊带

word_family.mean: v. 升起；上升；起身；站起；隆起；高起；增加；增长；上涨；提高；改善；接近

sense_info_list.zh: 抬高(价格); 增加(数量)

examination_example.sentence: But deaths are thought to have <highlight>risen</highlight> by 40% since 1990 in many low income countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但据认为，自1990年以来，许多低收入国家的死亡人数增加了40%。

examination_example.sentence: But such levies are on the <highlight>rise</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是这种征税正在增加。

sense_info_list.en: the act of becoming more important, successful, powerful

examination_example.sentence: What did Neil Postman say about the <highlight>rise</highlight> of television?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于电视的兴起，尼尔·波兹曼说了什么？

examination_example.sentence: Workers' unions have the inevitability of the introduction of new technology, but they still have reservations about the <highlight>rise</highlight> of automation technology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工会必然会引进新技术，但对自动化技术的兴起仍持保留意见。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>Rise</highlight> of Skywalker, which was filmed after Fisher's death in 2016.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《天行者崛起》，拍摄于2016年费舍尔死后。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>rise</highlight> and fall from year to year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们每年都有升有降。

examination_example.sentence: Stock prices <highlight>rose</highlight> or sank according to his pronouncements.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 股票价格根据他的声明上涨或下跌。

examination_example.sentence: It can give <highlight>rise</highlight> to endless disputes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它会引发无休止的争端。

examination_example.sentence: The IQ of the children in the two musical groups <highlight>rose</highlight> by an average of seven points in the course of a year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一年的时间里，这两个音乐团的孩子们的智商平均提高了7分。

examination_example.sentence: Food manufacturers' <highlight>rising</highlight> awareness of product safety.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 食品制造商对产品安全的认识的提高。

examination_example.sentence: It has given <highlight>rise</highlight> to much controversy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这引起了很多争议。

sense_info_list.en: get up from lying, kneeling, or sitting

word_usage.usage:
rise、raise都可表示“上升，增长”，区别如下：
rise是不及物动词，后面不能加宾语。示例：
The waves rose and fell. 
波浪起起伏伏。
raise是及物动词，后面必须有宾语。示例：
I raised the box above my head. 
我把盒子举过了头顶。

rise表示“（太阳、月亮等）从哪个方向升起”时，介词用in不用from。
示例：太阳从东方升起。
The sun rises in the east.

rise不能用于被动结构，其过去分词risen可作形容词，表示“已升起的”。
示例：The moon is risen.
月亮已经升起来了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 抬高(价格); 增加(数量)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 反抗；起义；造反；叛乱

word_family.mean: v. 升起；上升；起身；站起；隆起；高起；增加；增长；上涨；提高；改善；接近

sense_info_list.zh: 抬高(价格); 增加(数量)

examination_example.sentence: Researchers think that one explanation is that ties to friends are broken while academic demands are <highlight>rising</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员认为，一种解释是，当学术需求上升时，与朋友的联系被打破了。

examination_example.sentence: And the <highlight>rises</highlight> were short-lived: prices typically returned to normal with the nest harvest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且这种上涨是短暂的：价格通常会在收获季节时回归正常。

examination_example.sentence: As demand for food <highlight>rises</highlight> faster than supplies are growing, the resulting food-price inflation puts severe stress on the governments of many countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于食品需求的增长速度快于供应的增长速度，由此导致的食品价格上涨给许多国家的政府带来了严重的压力。

examination_example.sentence: It has witnessed a <highlight>rise</highlight> in accidental drowning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它见证了意外溺水的上升。

examination_example.sentence: The move is due to global warming and <highlight>rising</highlight> sea levels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一举动是由于全球变暖和海平面上升。

examination_example.sentence: Wilson will lead a class of <highlight>rising</highlight> fifth-graders at a day camp dedicated to Chinese culture and the Chinese-American community in Oakland.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 威尔逊将带领一群五年级新生参加一个致力于中国文化和奥克兰华裔社区的日间夏令营。

sense_info_list.en: the act of becoming more important; successful; powerful

examination_example.sentence: But in today's America—a land of <highlight>rising</highlight> inequality, increasing segregation, and stagnating middle-class wages—can the San Jose region really once again become a place of opportunity?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但在今天的美国——一个不平等抬头、种族隔离加剧、中产阶级工资停滞不前的土地——圣何塞地区真的能再次成为一个充满机遇的地方吗？

examination_example.sentence: The things people make, and the way they make them, determine how cities grow and decline, and influence how empires <highlight>rise</highlight> and fall.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们制造的东西以及他们制造的方式决定了城市如何发展和衰落，并影响着帝国的兴衰。

examination_example.sentence: This is in response to <highlight>rising</highlight> air pollution that made Paris the most polluted city in the world for a brief time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是为了应对日益严重的空气污染，巴黎曾一度成为世界上污染最严重的城市。

sense_info_list.en: swell because of the action of yeast or baking powder

examination_example.sentence: There is still some way to go to ensure women are <highlight>rising</highlight> through the ranks to higher grade positions and being paid appropriately.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要确保女性逐步晋升到更高的职位并获得适当的薪酬，还有一段路要走。

word_usage.usage:
rise、raise都可表示“上升，增长”，区别如下：
rise是不及物动词，后面不能加宾语。示例：
The waves rose and fell. 
波浪起起伏伏。
raise是及物动词，后面必须有宾语。示例：
I raised the box above my head. 
我把盒子举过了头顶。

rise表示“（太阳、月亮等）从哪个方向升起”时，介词用in不用from。
示例：太阳从东方升起。
The sun rises in the east.

rise不能用于被动结构，其过去分词risen可作形容词，表示“已升起的”。
示例：The moon is risen.
月亮已经升起来了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 变得成功; 地位提高

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 可引起；导致；使发生(或存在)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 反抗；起义；造反；叛乱

word_family.mean: v. 升起；上升；起身；站起；隆起；高起；增加；增长；上涨；提高；改善；接近

examination_example.sentence: Cattle tend to be kept in remote places and their value has <highlight>risen</highlight>, making them appealing targets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 牛往往被饲养在偏远的地方，它们的价值也在上升，这使它们成为吸引人的目标。

examination_example.sentence: There has been a dramatic <highlight>rise</highlight> in the number of extreme weather events over the past 20 years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在过去20年中，极端天气事件的数量急剧上升。

examination_example.sentence: The average number of electronic devices <highlight>rose</highlight> from four per household in 1992 to 13 in 2007.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电子设备的平均数量从1992年的每户4台增加到2007年的每户13台。

sense_info_list.en: get up from lying, kneeling, or sitting
to become important, powerful, successful, or rich
sense_info_list.zh: 变得成功; 地位提高

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>rose</highlight> in the ranks not by being friendly but by smoking cigarettes, breaking rules and playing jokes on others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在（学生）地位中上升，方式不是通过待人友善而是通过吸烟、违反规则和嘲弄别人。

sense_info_list.en: an area of land that slopes upswards.

examination_example.sentence: I climbed to the top of a small <highlight>rise</highlight> and realised that the mist was little more than a few feet deep.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我爬到了一个小山的山顶，发现这里的薄雾仅有几英尺深。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 反抗；起义；造反；叛乱

word_family.mean: v. 升起；上升；起身；站起；隆起；高起；增加；增长；上涨；提高；改善；接近

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 兴衰；起伏；（价格等的）涨落

examination_example.sentence: During the day, the hottest time is between 2 pm and 4 pm when temperatures <highlight>rise</highlight> to 33℃.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 白天，最热的时候在下午2点到4点之间，这段时间气温能上升到33摄氏度。

examination_example.sentence: When the lanterns are lit, they slowly <highlight>rise</highlight> into the air like small hot-air balloons for all to see.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当灯笼被点燃时，它们像小热气球一样慢慢升到空中，让所有人都能看到。

examination_example.sentence: National Treasure quickly <highlight>rose</highlight> to the top television rating ranks after it was presented on CCTV.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《国家宝藏》在中央电视台播出后，迅速上升到电视收视率榜首。

examination_example.sentence: Chinese is becoming a global (全球的) language and its popularity has <highlight>risen</highlight> around the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 汉语正在成为一种全球性的语言，它的知名度也在世界范围内上升。

examination_example.sentence: Research company Nielsen found that in the UK, sales of e-books are falling while sales of paper books are <highlight>rising</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究公司Nielsen发现，在英国，电子书的销量在下降，而纸质书的销量在上升。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>rise</highlight> of social networking has made it easier for people with uncommon diseases to connect with each other and feel less alone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 社交网络的兴起使患有罕见疾病的人更容易相互联系，感觉不那么孤独。

sense_info_list.en: get up from lying, kneeling, or sitting

examination_example.sentence: Early to bed and early to <highlight>rise</highlight> makes a man healthy, wealthy and wise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 早睡早起使人健康、富有、聪明。

examination_example.sentence: Edward <highlight>rose</highlight> early on the New-year morning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新年的早晨，爱德华早早起床了。

examination_example.sentence: Students <highlight>rose</highlight> respectfully when the teacher entered the room.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 老师走进教室时，学生们恭恭敬敬地站了起来。

sense_info_list.en: become more important, successful, or powerful

examination_example.sentence: The progress brought a sudden <highlight>rise</highlight> of news business.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一进步让新闻业突然崛起。

examination_example.sentence: Readers always enjoy seeing poor people <highlight>rise</highlight> and succeed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 读者总是喜欢看到穷人崛起并获得成功。

examination_example.sentence: Yan is a <highlight>rising</highlight> star in the science world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Yan是科学界的后起之秀。

word_usage.usage:
rise、raise都可表示“上升，增长”，区别如下：
rise是不及物动词，后面不能加宾语。示例：
The waves rose and fell. 
波浪起起伏伏。
raise是及物动词，后面必须有宾语。示例：
I raised the box above my head. 
我把盒子举过了头顶。

rise表示“（太阳、月亮等）从哪个方向升起”时，介词用in不用from。
示例：太阳从东方升起。
The sun rises in the east.

rise不能用于被动结构，其过去分词risen可作形容词，表示“已升起的”。
示例：The moon is risen.
月亮已经升起来了。
